data.oai_dc:dc: Newbler gsAssembler v 2.8 (Roche, Switzerland, seed step = 12, seed length = 16, seed count = 1, minimum overlap length = 40, minimum overlap identity =90%, alignment identity score = 2, alignment difference score = -3). This assembly has not be filtered like the version available on the NCBI (NCBI filters: length > 200bp, <10% N's, <14c consecutive N's)
